synopsis.text: When the tranquil world of Cronos, inhabited by sentient robots with human-like minds, is disrupted by the invading forces of the Gandora organization, a hero must rise to protect his planet and its precious energy source, the Hyribead. Rom Stol, son of the wise Master Kirai and a skilled martial artist, inherits the powerful Wolf Sword upon his father's death, transforming him into a formidable force against the Gandora. Alongside his sister Leina and a team of transformable mecha warriors, Rom embarks on a perilous journey to defend Cronos, harness the might of the giant robot Kenryuu, and prevent the Hyribead from falling into the wrong hands. Prepare for an epic battle of machine versus machine in this thrilling anime adventure!
